content: {A歪头}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, kula bata~ Friends are like signposts on life's journey. What I mean to say is, I'm so glad to see you!
info: NPC访客-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: {A抱歉}I was just thinking about how to describe your home in the travel journal, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. <style=SizeSmall>If only I could record the sounds and smells and put them in there too...</style>
info: NPC访客-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: {A笑眯眯}Kula bata~! Nice to see you again, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. My ears tell me this place is as interesting as you are!
info: NPC访客-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: {A加油}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, kula bata! I heard a "peh-poh peh-poh" sound. Your territory is really interesting!
info: NPC访客-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里

content: If you need travel advice, I'll have to charge you for that.{短暂停}{A抱歉} Ahem, just kidding! You did "save" me before after all, so it's free of charge for you, forever.
info: NPC访客-模版-1013萨飞里_萨飞里
